  <br>
 SnapFlix
  <br>
</h1>

<h4 align="center">A minimal Movie info Website mase With <a href="https://www.themoviedb.org/" target="_blank">TMDB</a>.</h4>

![screenshot](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/140090637/298263859-2fe0bc0d-229e-4704-ba90-e481d4967c86.jpeg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..jDjAjW1AiUtfpdr9bucnx2sv2NjDx7IlBvXZEVqvJIs)

## Key Features

* Upcoming Movies on Hero Banner.
* Dynamic Skeleton Loader 
* Movie Detail Section
* Videos Relevant to That Movie
* Actor Details
* Infinite Scrolling
* Supports Multiple Cursors
* Similar & Recommended Movies Section
